tinymce-source-insert-local-file: Enter the title of file that has already been uploaded (without the namespace prefix)
tinymce-no-file-name: File name empty - did you select the appropriate radio button?
tinymce-sideupload-drop-error: Problem encountered uploading $1 directly from website. Try downloading to a local disk and using the insert image button to upload from there
tinymce-wikimagic: Add wiki templates, parser functions and magic words
tinymce-wikimagic-title: Wiki templates, parser functions and magic words
tinymce-wikisourcecode: View and edit wiki source code
tinymce-insert-linebreak: Insert single linebreak at current position
tinymce-preference: Use the TinyMCE editor to edit pages
tinymce-upload-type-tooltip: Enter the type of file you wish to upload: a local file which is on your device or a file located at a URL on the internet or display a file on this page which has already been uploaded onto this wiki
tinymce-upload-source-tooltip: Enter the full file path of file you wish to upload: a local file which is on your device or a file located at a URL on the internet or a file which has already been uploaded onto this wiki
tinymce-upload-destination-tooltip: Enter the full filename for storing this file on this wiki
tinymce-upload-summary-tooltip: Enter text to be added to the file's page on this wiki
tinymce-upload-link-tooltip: Enter a link which this image will link to if clicked on
tinymce-upload-alttext-tooltip: Enter alternative text for this image
tinymce-upload-dimensions-tooltip: Enter dimensions for this image.  If you wish to fix the proportions select the tick box and enter just the height, otherwise deselect the tick box and enter both height and width
tinymce-upload-vertalign-tooltip: Select the vertical alignment for this image
tinymce-upload-horizontalalign-tooltip: Select the horizontal alignment for this image
tinymce-upload-format-tooltip: Select the format for this image
tinymce-upload-alert-uploads-not-enabled: I'm sorry, uploads aren't enabled on this wiki
tinymce-upload-alert-uploads-not-allowed: I'm sorry, you are not allowed to upload to this wiki
tinymce-upload-alert-error-uploading-to-: I'm sorry, there seems to be a problem accessing the wiki from this dialog.  If the problem persists try logging off and on again
tinymce-upload-alert-file-type-not-allow: I'm sorry, you are not allowed to upload files of this type to this wiki. Please choose a file of a different type
tinymce-upload-alert-unknown-error-uploa: I'm sorry, you have encountered an unknown error trying to upload this file.  If this error persists please cntact your systems administrator
tinymce-upload-alert-error-uploading: I'm sorry, you have encountered an error trying to upload to this wiki : $1. If this continues please contact your administrator
tinymce-upload-alert-warnings-encountere: I'm sorry, you have encountered the following warnings trying to upload this file:
tinymce-upload-alert-destination-filenam: The destination filename is not allowed
tinymce-upload-alert-duplicate-file: The file is a duplicate of $1
tinymce-upload-alert-correct-and-try-aga: Please correct the errors and try again
tinymce-upload-alert-destination-filenam: I'm sorry, you have to provide a destination file name. If the one generated is OK then press Submit again or else change it
tinymce-upload-alert-source-or-destinati: I'm sorry, you there's a problem with either the source or destination being undefined.  Please check and try again
tinymce-upload-confirm-file-already-exis: The destination file already exists on this wiki.  Select Ok if you would like to use the existing file or select Cancel and enter a different destination filename for this upload
tinymce-upload-confirm-file-not-on-wiki: The file does not exist on this wiki.  Select Ok if you would like to upload a new file or select Cancel and enter a different filename for this link
tinymce-upload-confirm-ignore-warnings: Select Ok if you wish to retry while ignoring these warnings, else select Cancel
